<!-- Caramel Smooth Image Rotator -->
<div id="caramel-rotator" class="position-relative overflow-hidden text-center" style="height: 300px;">
  <img src="assets/img/farm1.png" class="rotator-img active" alt="Farm 1">
  <img src="assets/img/farm2.png" class="rotator-img" alt="Farm 2">
  <img src="assets/img/farm3.png" class="rotator-img" alt="Farm 3">
</div>

<style>
  .rotator-img {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    width:800px;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    opacity: 1;
    transition: opacity 5s ease-in-out;
  }

  .rotator-img.active {
    opacity: 1;
    z-index: 1;
  }
</style>

<script>
  const rotatorImages = document.querySelectorAll(".rotator-img");
  let currentIndex = 0;

  setInterval(() => {
    rotatorImages[currentIndex].classList.remove("active");
    currentIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % rotatorImages.length;
    rotatorImages[currentIndex].classList.add("active");
  }, 5000); // 10-second caramel fade
</script>
